Description: Creates a trail of spikes that start from the player and go out in a straight line for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">8m</font> dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spikes.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. The final spike is a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Mighty Spike</font> that will deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spikes_End.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushing</font> back enemies. Pressing light attack before the path fully forms will spawn the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Mighty Spike</font> early.\n\nCost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.60.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Cooldown for this ability reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.SpikesRefreshingSpikes.CooldownTimer * -100]}% </font> if an enemy is hit by the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Mighty Spike</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Mighty Spike</font> damage increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.SpikesEmpoweredSpikes.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> when hitting an enemy below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.SpikesEmpoweredSpikes.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Increases damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10% </font> and adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stagger</font> to the path of spikes. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not increase Mighty Spike damage.)</font>

Ice shards fire from the sides of the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Mighty Spike</font> to hit a wider area.  Each shard has a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6m</font> range and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spike_Reach.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

Create a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font> radius storm at the target area that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.IceMagic_IceStorm.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_IceStorm.TickRate]}s</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5s</font>. The storm also creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> that slows enemies in it by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_IceStorm.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>\n\nCost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.61.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Ice Storm damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceStormWeakeningGust.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> to enemies below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceStormWeakeningGust.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.
Ice Storm mana cost is decreased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">80%</font> while at full mana.

Increases Ice Storm damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceStormPunishingStorm.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for each enemy in Ice Storm. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#808080">(Max {[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceStormPunishingStorm.MaxNumAroundMe]} targets.)</font>

Blasts a column of freezing winds forward that <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushes</font> back enemies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font> and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.IceMagic_WindChill.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">0.2s</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2s</font>. Wind Chill has a total range of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">7m</font> with the farthest <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2m</font> increasing damage <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">20%</font> without pushing enemies.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(Player is able to move during the attack.)</font>

Cost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.63.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.
Increase duration of Wind Chill by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1s</font>.

Increase the damage of the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2m</font> of the Wind Chill range by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.WindChillShatter.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font>.

Increase damage of basic attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass1.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for targets farther than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass1.DistFromDefender]}m</font>.
Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass2.Mana * 100]}</font> mana whenever you critically hit a target.

Increase critical damage of ice gauntlet abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass3.CritDamage * 100]}%</font> while stamina is full.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass4.Mana * 100]}</font> mana whenever you hit with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass4.NumConsecutiveHits]}</font> consecutive light attacks.

Increase <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">critical chance</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass5.CritChance * 100]}%</font> when hitting an enemy in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> or when hitting an enemy with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frostbite</font>.

Heavy attacks will <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">root</font> a target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Freeze.BaseDuration]}s</font> if they are standing in Ice Storm or have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frostbite</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Freeze_Cooldown.BaseDuration]}s cooldown after root expires.)</font>

Ice gauntlet abilities <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">chill</font> targets, increasing ice damage dealt to the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestUltimate_Helper.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_UltimateChill.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Place a pylon that fires ice projectiles at enemies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">20m</font>. Projectiles deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.IceMagic_Pylon.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage if they hit. Ice Pylon creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1m</font> radius <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> around itself and lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">15s</font> unless it is destroyed.\n\nCost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.67.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Increases damage of Ice Pylon by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IcePylonGreaterPylon.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> against <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slowed</font> targets.
Ice Pylon regenerates to full health <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_PylonRefresh.BaseDuration]}s</font> after last damage taken.
Dodging increases Ice Pylon rate of fire for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3s</font>.

A successful hit from the Ice Pylon extends its lifetime by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Maximum {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_PylonCooldownSafety.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

Summon a shower of ice that creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> approximately <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1m by 5m</font> that lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4s</font>. Enemies that enter the Ice Shower will be stricken with a powerful <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frostbite</font>.

Frostbite <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">roots</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_IceShower_Freeze.BaseDuration]}s</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slows</font> movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Frostbite.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font>, and will remain on target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Frostbite_Dur3.BaseDuration]}s</font> after exiting the Ice Shower. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Ice Shower's root can only be applied once every {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_IceShower_Freeze_Cooldown.BaseDuration]}s to the same target.)</font>

Cost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.66.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.
Increase Ice Shower duration to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">7s</font>.

Any ally, including self, will get a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_QuickShower_Dur2.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_QuickShower_Dur2.BaseDuration]}s</font> when entering Ice Shower.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Frostbite</font> applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font> to target, reducing their defense by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Frostbite_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]}%</font>.

Entomb yourself in ice to become <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">invulnerable</font> and greatly increase mana regeneration. The tomb lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10s</font> but can be destroyed early.

Press ability input or block to exit the tomb normally or press light attack to exit while causing a damaging <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">push</font> at the cost of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.65.ManaCost]}</font> mana. The <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">push</font> deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.IceMagic_Entombed_Break.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage to enemies in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> radius.

Cost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.64.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_StrengthenedTomb.ABSStandard * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_StrengthenedTomb.BaseDuration]}s</font> after breaking out of Entombed. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify reduces incoming damage.)</font>
Cleanse all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs</font> when Entombed activates.

Blocking an attack with the ice gauntlet will convert mana to stamina. Converts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_BlockingStamina.Mana * -1]}</font> mana to  <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_BlockingStamina.Stamina]}</font> stamina.

Increase movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_QuickFrost.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font>.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_EmpoweredFrost.Mana]}</font> mana for each spell cast while in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Slow</font> enemies by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_FrozenTouch.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_FrozenTouch.BaseDuration]}s</font> when they hit you with a melee attack while your health is full. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

Reduce the cooldown of all ice gauntlet abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceConjurorPass5.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> when casting an ability in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font>.

Casting an ice gauntlet ability grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_DefiantFreeze.ABSStandard * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_DefiantFreeze.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify reduces incoming damage.)</font>

Doubles Ice Pylon's health and extends Ice Pylon's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> radius to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font>.  Standing in this <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> doubles Quick Frost and Empowered Frost bonuses.
